Question
========

Of 8 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 8 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 30 and the standard deviation is 36. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 1
* 2.34
* 2.36
* 2.66

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1: Incorrect
* 2.34: Incorrect
* 2.36: Correct
* 2.66: Incorrect
